warscrolls.name: Beast-smasher Mega-Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Menhir Club** is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Behemoth Brawler
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of enemy **MONSTERS** while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Beast-breaking Strike
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can make a pile-in move. Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 5D6 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Gatebreaker Mega-Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Fortcrusha Flail** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Smash Down
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is **FACTION TERRAIN**, inflict D3+3 mortal damage on it. Then, roll a D3 for each non-**MONSTER** unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of the target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Pulverising Strike
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can make a pile-in move. Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 4D6 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: King Brodd
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Priest (1), Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Obelisk of Tor Crania** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Creepers
abilities.effect: This unit cannot be picked to be the target of enemy **RAMPAGE** abilities.

abilities.name: Power of Behemat
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects. If the chanting roll was 10+, pick 2 instead:

***Shatter the Mountains:*** Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units for the rest of the turn.

***Might of the Earth:*** **Heal (D3)** each friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** unit.

***Pummel All to Dust:*** For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the **Obelisk of Tor Crania**, **Menhir Club**, **Fortcrusha Flail**, **Shipwrecka Warclub**, **Titanic Boulderclub** and **Massive Club** used by friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Sons of Behemat

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

warscrolls.name: Kraken-eater Mega-Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Shipwrecka Warclub** is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Net
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 3 dice. For each roll that is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Get Orf Me Land!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an objective within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, move the target 2D6" to a new position on the battlefield more than 1" from all models, terrain features and other objectives. That objective is treated as if it were in the same territories as it was when it was first set up on the battlefield for the purposes of the battleplan.

warscrolls.name: Mancrusher Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Gargant

abilities.name: Keep Up!
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT**, this unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Mancrusher Mob
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Gargant

abilities.name: Keep Up!
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT**, this unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: 'Oo's Under The Heel Now?
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses the ‘Gargant Charge’ ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, for each model in this unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Kraken-eater Mega-Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Shipwrecka Warclub** is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Sons of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Emerge From The Deep
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **beneath the waves**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units and wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Lurking Beneath The Waves
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **beneath the waves**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Warstomper Mega-Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Sons of Behemat, Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Titanic Boulderclub** is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Hurled Body
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the target’s Health characteristic.

abilities.name: Titanic Boulderclub
abilities.effect: If all of the attacks made with this unit’s **Titanic Boulderclub** target the same enemy unit, for every 5 models in the target unit, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic for the rest of the phase.

rules.name: Big Mouth
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a friendly MEGA-GARGANT
rules.effect: Pick a friendly **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

rules.name: Revel in War
rules.effect: You can pick 2 friendly **MEGA‑GARGANTS** or **GARGANT** units that have not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use the ‘Jump Up and Down’ ability instead of 1.

rules.name: Besieging Bulk
rules.effect: Friendly **MEGA-GARGANTS** have **WARD (6+)** while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly **MEGA-GARGANTS**.

rules.name: Lofty Louts
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **Mancrusher Gargant** unit to be the target.
rules.effect: For the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **GARGANT** units while they are wholly within 12" of the target and not wholly within 12" of any friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** units.

rules.name: Strike! Hur Hur!
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
rules.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** units within 3" of any terrain features and pick any friendly **GARGANT** units within 3" of any terrain features to be the targets.
rules.effect: Double the Attacks characteristic of each target’s ranged weapons for the rest of the turn. If the target has no ranged weapons, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the target instead and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

rules.name: More Stuff For Me Collection
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE SONS OF BEHEMAT HERO** that does not have an artefact of power.
rules.effect:
Give that **HERO** 1 artefact of power from ‘Titanic Trophies’.

**Designer’s Note:** *This artefact of power is given to the unit during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*

artefacts.name: Lucky Shiny Hat
artefacts.effect: This unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage points inflicted by **SPELL** and **PRAYER** abilities and by abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**.

artefacts.name: Glowy Shield of Protectiness
artefacts.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

artefacts.name: Amberbone Totem
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

artefacts.name: Kingslaughter Cowl
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while this unit is in combat with an enemy **HERO**.

artefacts.name: Extra-calloused Feet
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic, Rend characteristic and Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Almighty Stomp** or **Almightier Stomp**.

artefacts.name: Mantle of Tusk and Horns
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Combat Phase
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Glowy Lantern
artefacts.effect: This unit can use **SUMMON** abilities from the manifestation lore you picked during army composition as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

heroicTraits.name: I Can Do That Better
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Reaction: You declared the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability for a friendly unit
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can use the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability immediately after the ‘Wrath of Brodd’ ability used by the other friendly unit has been resolved. This unit can do so even if it has used another **RAMPAGE** ability this turn.

heroicTraits.name: Monstrously Tough
heroicTraits.effect: This unit has a Health characteristic of 40 instead of 35.

heroicTraits.name: Rabble Rouser
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Furious Temper
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.
• Subtract 1 from save rolls for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Terrifying Hulk
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Your opponent declared a CHARGE ability for a visible non-MONSTER enemy unit within 12" of this unit
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, you can change one of the dice in that charge roll to a 1.

heroicTraits.name: Mega-Grump
heroicTraits.effect: This unit has **WARD (5+)** while it has 25 or more damage points.

heroicTraits.name: Grabby
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks that target an enemy unit contesting an objective you do not control.

other.name: Bellowing Mockery
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn, then pick an enemy unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

other.name: What're You Lookin' At?
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
other.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it charged this turn and has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn. Then, pick an enemy unit within 9" of this unit to be the target.
other.effect: Roll 2D6. This unit can move a number of inches equal to the roll. It can pass through enemy models and must end that move in combat with the target.

other.name: Projectile Vomit
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
other.declare: Pick this unit to use this ability if it has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn. Then, pick a point on the battlefield within 6" of this unit and pick each enemy unit within 3" of that point to be the targets.
other.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that target equal to the roll.

other.name: Shake the Earth
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
other.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is **INFANTRY**, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Timberrrrr!
other.effect: When the **MEGA‑GARGANT** in this regiment of renown is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

other.name: Dead Cunning, For a Gargant
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.effect:
For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons.

Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Timberrrrr!
other.effect: When the **MEGA‑GARGANT** in this regiment of renown is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

other.name: Mighty Walloper
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

other.name: Timberrrrr!
other.effect: When the **MEGA‑GARGANT** in this regiment of renown is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

other.name: Grievous Halitosis
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

other.name: Timberrrrr!
other.effect: When the **MEGA‑GARGANT** in this regiment of renown is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battleTraits.name: The World Titan's Prophet
battleTraits.effect:
While any other friendly **BRODD’S STOMP** units are within a friendly **King Brodd**’s combat range:

• That friendly **King Brodd** has **WARD (5+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that friendly **King Brodd**, allocate 1 damage point to another friendly **BRODD’S STOMP** unit within its combat range after the damage sequence for that friendly **King Brodd** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

battleTraits.name: Wrath of Brodd
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: If the unit using this ability charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit can move 3D6" but must end that move in combat.

battleTraits.name: Watch This!
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
If the target is a **HERO**, **BEAST**, **MONSTER** or **WAR MACHINE**, roll 6 dice. Otherwise, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each roll that is equal to or greater than the target’s Save characteristic, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

The **MEGA‑GARGANT** using this **RAMPAGE** has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Double Stomp
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D6. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, add the result to the Attacks characteristic of the **Almighty Stomp** or **Almightier Stomp** of the unit using this ability.

battleTraits.name: Timberrrrr!
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **MEGA‐GARGANT** or **GARGANT** model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battleTraits.name: Smash It All To Bits
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a terrain feature within its combat range. Then, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of that **MEGA-GARGANT** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each friendly and enemy unit on the terrain feature that was picked. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. After rolling for all those units, roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Crafty Creepers
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability. Then, pick an enemy **HERO** that has an artefact of power and is in combat with that **MEGA‑GARGANT** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target no longer has that artefact of power.

battleTraits.name: Gargant Charge
battleTraits.declare:
Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit that has not been picked as the target of this ability this turn and that is in combat with that unit to be the target.

**Designer’s Note**: *This ability can be used by any number of friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** and **GARGANT** units that charged in each turn.*
battleTraits.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Colossal Slam
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‐GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy **MONSTER** or **WAR MACHINE** that has a unit size of 1 and is within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again within 1" of the unit using this ability. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Jump Up and Down
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. If the unit using this ability is a **GARGANT**, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 6. If it is a **MEGA-GARGANT,** inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 5+.

battleTraits.name: Timberrrrr!
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** or **GARGANT** model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battleTraits.name: Earthshaking Roar
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA‑GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.
